t: Think of 'love' (ài). The top part looks like a hand, and the bottom contains 'friend' (友 yǒu). Imagine holding a friend close.
Combination of 'love' (爱 ài) + 'good' (好 hǎo). A 'hobby' is something you love and feel good about.
The number 'eight' (bā). It looks like two dividing strokes. Note they do not touch at the top, unlike 'human' (人 rén).
The top part is 'father' (父 fù), and the bottom (巴 bā) provides the sound. Look for the 'mustache' shape at the top.
Repeating 'dad' (bà). In Chinese, doubling kinship terms makes them informal and affectionate.
A 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical + the sound 'ba'. It's a suggestion particle, like saying something out loud to see if others agree.
Looks like a 'sun' (日 rì) with a little light ray coming out of the top. Think of bright 'white' light.
'White' (白 bái) + 'day/sky' (天 tiān). When the sky is white/bright, it is 'daytime'.
The number 'hundred' (bǎi). It is the character for 'white' (白 bái) with an extra horizontal line on top representing 'one'.
Two 'jade' pieces (王 wáng) separated by a 'knife' (刂 dāo). Think of a 'class' or 'shift' as a carved-out block of time.
Looks like an object being sliced down the middle into two 'halves' (bàn).
'Half' (半 bàn) + 'year' (年 nián). Simple logic for 'half a year'.
'Half' (半 bàn) + 'day' (天 tiān). Usually used to mean 'a long time' or 'half the day'.
The top relates to 'state' and the bottom is 'cloth' (巾 jīn). Think of a 'helping' hand mending cloth.
'Help' (帮 bāng) + 'busy' (忙 máng). You help someone when they are too busy to do it alone.
Looks like a 'wrap' or 'bundle'. The curve encloses something, just like a 'bag' or 'package'.
'Wrap' (包 bāo) + noun suffix (子 zi). A 'steamed bun' is dough wrapped around a filling.
The 'tree/wood' (木 mù) radical on the left tells you cups used to be made of wood. The right (不 bù) is for the sound.
The word for 'cup' (bēi zi). The 'zi' turns the single character into a common noun.
Looks like two people sitting back-to-back (北 běi). In ancient houses, people sat facing south to avoid the cold 'north' wind hitting their backs.
'North' (北 běi) + 'side' (边 biān). Means 'the north side' or 'northern part'.
'North' (北 běi) + 'capital' (京 jīng). Literally the 'Northern Capital'.
The character for 'tree' (木 mù) with a line at the bottom to show the 'roots'. This represents the 'origin' or 'measure word for books'.
A 'notebook' (běn zi). It uses the measure word for books (本) as its base.
Two people standing next to each other to 'compare' (bǐ) their height.
Features a 'knife' (刂 dāo) radical on the right. Think of 'separating' or 'don't' do something—cutting off an action.
'Other' (别 bié) + possessive (的 de). Refers to 'something else' or 'other things'.
'Other' (别 bié) + 'person' (人 rén). Literally 'other people'.
The outside radical (疒 nè) represents 'sickness'. The inside (丙 bǐng) is for sound. Look for the 'bed' shape in the radical.
'Sickness' (病 bìng) + 'person' (人 rén). A 'patient'.
Looks like a bird flying up into the sky and 'not' (bù) coming down.
'Not' (不 bù) + 'big' (大 dà). Means 'not very big' or 'not often'.
'Not' (不 bù) + 'correct' (对 duì). Simply 'incorrect' or 'wrong'.
'Not' (不 bù) + 'polite/guest' (客气 kè qì). The standard way to say 'You're welcome' (Don't be so formal).
'Not' (不 bù) + 'use' (用 yòng). Literally 'no need to use' or 'need not'.
Top is 'grass' (艹 cǎo), bottom has 'wood/plant' (木 mù). It represents 'vegetables' or 'dishes' made from plants.
Top is 'grass' (艹 cǎo), middle is a person (人 rén), bottom is 'wood/tree' (木 mù). A person among the plants picking 'tea'.
Originally related to 'uneven' wool. Think of it as 'falling short' or 'a difference' (chà).
The top represents 'clothing' and the bottom is 'towel' (巾 jīn). Think of things you use 'often' like everyday clothes.
Doubling 'often' (cháng) emphasizes the frequency—'regularly' or 'frequently'.
The 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical on the left + two 'suns' (日 rì) on the right. Imagine singing from dawn until dusk.
'Sing' (唱 chàng) + 'song' (歌 gē). The verb-object form of 'to sing'.
A simplified drawing of a 'cart' or 'chariot' (chē) seen from above.
'Vehicle' (车 chē) + 'ticket' (票 piào). A bus or train ticket.
'Vehicle' (车 chē) + 'on/above' (上 shàng). Being 'on the bus' or 'in the car'.
'Vehicle' (车 chē) + 'station/stand' (站 zhàn). Where the cars stand/stop.
Uses the 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical. The right side (乞 qǐ) looks like someone begging for food to 'eat'.
'Eat' (吃 chī) + 'cooked rice/meal' (饭 fàn). The general term for 'having a meal'.
Two 'mountains' (山 shān) stacked. Think of something 'coming out' from behind the mountains.
'Exit' (出 chū) + 'come' (来 lái). To come out towards the speaker.
'Exit' (出 chū) + 'go' (去 qù). To go out away from the speaker.
The top radical (穴 xué) means 'hole' or 'cave'. To 'wear' (chuān) clothes, you put your limbs through the holes.
The 'shelter' radical (广 guǎng) on the outside and 'wood' (木 mù) on the inside. A wooden piece of furniture under a roof: a 'bed'.
Left side means 'ice/second'. Right side is 'yawn' (欠 qiàn). Think of a 'sequence' or 'times' something happens.
Two people (人 rén) following each other. One person follows 'from' (cóng) the other's starting point.
Left is 'metal' (钅 jīn). Originally meant a mistake in plating metal. Now it just means 'wrong' or 'error'.
The 'hand' (扌 shǒu) radical + 'nail/T-shape' (丁 dīng). Using a hand to hit a nail: 'to hit' or 'to play'.
'Hit/Take' (打 dǎ) + 'car' (车 chē). To hail or 'take a taxi'.
'Hit' (打 dǎ) + 'electric' (电 diàn) + 'speech' (话 huà). To 'make a phone call'.
'Hit/Action' (打 dǎ) + 'open' (开 kāi). To 'open' something up (like a book or a door).
'Hit' (打 dǎ) + 'ball' (球 qiú). To 'play ball games' (basketball, tennis, etc.).
A person (人 rén) stretching their arms out wide to show how 'big' (dà) something is.
'Big' (大 dà) + 'study' (学 xué). 'University'—the place for big learning.
'University' (大学 dà xué) + 'student' (生 shēng). A college student.
Left is 'arrive', right is 'knife' (刂 dāo). Think of 'reaching' a point or 'arriving' at a destination.
The 'earth' (土 tǔ) radical on the left. This character refers to the 'ground' or 'land'.
'Ground' (地 dì) + 'point' (点 diǎn). A specific 'location' or 'place'.
'Ground' (地 dì) + 'square/region' (方 fāng). A 'place' or 'area'.
'Ground' (地 dì) + 'on' (上 shàng). 'On the ground'.
'Ground' (地 dì) + 'picture' (图 tú). A 'map'—a picture of the land.
A 'white' (白 bái) radical and a 'scoop'. It is the most common possessive marker (like 's).
'Obtain' (得 dé) + 'arrive' (到 dào). To 'get' or 'obtain' something.
Top is 'bamboo' (⺮ zhú), bottom is 'temple' (寺 sì). Think of ancient officials 'waiting' (děng) at a temple with bamboo scrolls.
Looks like a bow with a string wrapped around it. Represents a 'younger brother' (dì) who follows the lead.
The full word for 'younger brother' (dì di).
The 'bamboo' (⺮ zhú) radical + 'younger brother' (弟 dì). Used to create ordinal numbers like 'first' or 'second'.
'Ordinal marker' (第 dì) + 'two' (二 èr). 'Second'.
The bottom part (灬) represents 'fire'. Imagine 'dots' of fire or 'points' of light. Also used for 'o'clock'.
Looks like a 'sun/field' (田 tián) with a 'tail' representing a bolt of 'electricity' or 'lightning'.
'Electric' (电 diàn) + 'speech' (话 huà). A 'telephone'.
'Electric' (电 diàn) + 'brain' (脑 nǎo). A 'computer'—an electronic brain.
'Electric' (电 diàn) + 'vision' (视 shì). 'Television'.
'Television' (电视 diàn shì) + 'machine' (机 jī). The physical 'TV set'.
'Electric' (电 diàn) + 'shadow' (影 yǐng). A 'movie'—moving electric shadows.
'Movie' (电影 diàn yǐng) + 'courtyard/place' (院 yuàn). A 'cinema' or movie theater.
The sun rising behind a 'tree' (木 mù) represents the 'East' (dōng).
'East' (东 dōng) + 'side' (边 biān). 'The east side'.
'East' (东 dōng) + 'West' (西 xī). Together they mean 'things' or 'objects'.
Left is 'heavy' (重 zhòng), right is 'power/strength' (力 lì). Moving a heavy object requires 'movement/action'.
'Move' (动 dòng) + 'do/make' (作 zuò). A 'movement' or 'action'.
Left is 'person/capital', right is 'city' (阝). Means 'all' (dōu). Everyone in the city is 'all' here.
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical on the left. It means 'to read' (dú) or 'to study' aloud.
'Read' (读 dú) + 'book' (书 shū). To read a book or 'attend school'.
Left is 'again', right is 'inch' (寸 cùn). It means 'correct' or 'towards'. Checking twice to make sure it's 'right'.
A common phrase for 'I'm sorry'. Literally 'cannot face someone'.
Two 'moons/evenings' (夕 xī) stacked. One is some, two is 'many/much' (duō).
'Many' (多 duō) + 'few' (少 shǎo). Together they mean 'how much' or 'how many'.
Left is the 'food' (饣 shí) radical. Right is 'I' (我 wǒ). 'I' need 'food' because I am 'hungry' (è).
The word for 'son' (ér zi). 'Er' originally looked like a child's head with an open fontanelle.
Two horizontal lines. The number 'two' (èr).
The 'food' (饣 shí) radical + 'anti/reverse' (反 fǎn) for sound. Refers to 'cooked rice' or a 'meal'.
'Meal' (饭 fàn) + 'shop' (店 diàn). A 'restaurant' or hotel.
'Room' (房 fáng) + 'between/space' (间 jiān). A 'room' in a house.
A 'house' or 'building' (fáng zi).
Left side means 'square/direction', right is 'tap/strike'. To 'put' or 'release' (fàng) something.
'Release' (放 fàng) + 'vacation' (假 jià). To 'go on holiday'.
'Release' (放 fàng) + 'study' (学 xué). When school is over for the day.
Looks like a bird's 'wing' mid-flight. It means 'to fly' (fēi).
'Fly' (飞 fēi) + 'machine' (机 jī). An 'airplane'.
'Not' (非 fēi) + 'ordinary' (常 cháng). Something that is not ordinary is 'very' or 'extremely' (fēi cháng).
An 'eight' (八 bā) over a 'knife' (刀 dāo). A knife 'dividing' things into 'parts' or 'minutes' (fēn).
The outside encloses 'insects' (虫 chóng). Ancient people believed wind brought insects. It means 'wind' (fēng).
Looks like a 'pestle' or tool. Can mean 'dry' (gān) or 'to do' (gàn).
'Dry' (干 gān) + 'clean' (净 jìng). If it's wiped dry and washed, it is 'clean'.
'Do' (干 gàn) + 'what' (什么 shén me). 'What are you doing?'
Looks like a tall building with a roof and a high window. It means 'high' or 'tall' (gāo).
'High' (高 gāo) + 'spirit/mood' (兴 xìng). To be 'happy'.
Both characters have the 'speech' (讠 yán) or 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical. It means 'to tell' (gào sù).
Two 'possibilities' (可 kě) stacked. Imagine an older brother standing on another's shoulders to be taller. 'Older brother' (gē).
The informal word for 'older brother' (gē ge).
Left side (哥 gē) for sound, right side (欠 qiàn) is a person yawning/opening their mouth to 'sing a song'.
Looks like a person (人 rén) standing. It is the most common 'measure word' (gè).
Left is 'silk' (纟 sī). Imagine handing over a silk thread. It means 'to give' (gěi).
The 'foot' (⻊ zú) radical on the left. To 'follow' or 'with' someone using your feet (gēn).
'Work' (工 gōng) + 'person' (人 rén). A 'worker'.
To 'work' or a 'job' (gōng zuò). 'Gong' looks like a carpenter's tool.
Looks like a 'gate' with a latch. It means 'to close' or 'to turn off' (guān).
'Close' (关 guān) + result. 'To close up' (a door or window).
Top is 'middle', bottom is 'shell' (贝 bèi), which was ancient money. Something with many shells is 'expensive' (guì).
A 'jade' (玉 yù) inside a 'border' (囗). A kingdom protecting its jade/treasure: 'country' (guó).
'Country' (国 guó) + 'home' (家 jiā). 'Nation' or 'country'.
'Country' (国 guó) + 'outside' (外 wài). 'Abroad' or 'overseas'.
The 'walking' radical (辶 chuò) on the left. It means 'to pass' or 'to cross' (guò).
The 'walking' radical (辶 chuò). Can mean 'still', 'yet', or 'to return' (hái/huán).
'Still' (还 hái) + 'is' (是 shì). Used to mean 'or' in questions or 'still' in statements.
'Also' (还 hái) + 'have' (有 yǒu). 'Furthermore' or 'in addition'.
The 'child' (子 zǐ) radical is on the left. This means 'child' or 'children' (hái zi).
'Han (Chinese people)' (汉 hàn) + 'language' (语 yǔ). The 'Chinese language'.
'Han (Chinese)' (汉 hàn) + 'character' (字 zì). 'Chinese characters'.
A 'woman' (女 nǚ) and a 'child' (子 zǐ) together. This is considered 'good' (hǎo).
'Good' (好 hǎo) + 'eat' (吃 chī). 'Delicious'.
'Good' (好 hǎo) + 'look' (看 kàn). 'Beautiful' or 'good-looking'.
'Good' (好 hǎo) + 'listen' (听 tīng). 'Pleasant to hear'.
'Good' (好 hǎo) + 'play' (玩 wán). 'Fun'.
A 'mouth' (口 kǒu) on top of a 'hook'. Used for 'date' or 'number' (hào).
Uses the 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical. The right side looks like someone 'drinking' (hē) through a straw.
'Grain' (禾 hé) + 'mouth' (口 kǒu). Everyone has grain in their mouth: 'harmony' or 'and' (hé).
The 'step' radical (彳 chì) on the left. It means 'very' (hěn).
Looks like a person following another. It means 'behind' or 'after' (hòu).
'Behind' (后 hòu) + 'side' (边 biān). 'The back' or 'behind'.
'After' (后 hòu) + 'day' (天 tiān). 'The day after tomorrow'.
Top is 'grass' (艹 cǎo), bottom is 'change' (化 huà). Plants 'change' into 'flowers' (huā).
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical + 'tongue' (舌 shé). Using your tongue to speak 'words' or 'speech' (huà).
Left is 'earth' (土 tǔ), right is 'not'. Something that is 'bad' or 'broken' (huài).
A small square inside a large square. Think of going back inside: 'to return' (huí).
'Return' (回 huí) + 'answer' (答 dá). 'To answer' a question.
'Return' (回 huí) + 'arrive' (到 dào). 'To return to' a place.
'Return' (回 huí) + 'home' (家 jiā). 'To go home'.
'Return' (回 huí) + 'come' (来 lái). 'To come back'.
'Return' (回 huí) + 'go' (去 qù). 'To go back'.
A 'roof' (人 rén) over a 'cloud'. People meeting under a roof: 'can', 'will', or 'meeting' (huì).
'Fire' (火 huǒ) + 'car' (车 chē). A 'train'—originally powered by fire/steam.
'Machine' (机 jī) + 'place/field' (场 chǎng). An 'airport'.
'Machine/Plane' (机 jī) + 'ticket' (票 piào). A 'plane ticket'.
'Chicken' (鸡 jī) + 'egg' (蛋 dàn). 'Hen's egg'.
Looks like a small 'table'. It means 'how many' or 'a few' (jǐ).
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical + 'self' (己 jǐ). Telling yourself something to 'remember' (jì) it.
To 'remember' (jì de).
'Remember' (记 jì) + 'stay' (住 zhù). To 'memorize' or fix in your memory.
A 'roof' (宀 mián) with a 'pig' (豕 shǐ) underneath. In ancient China, having a pig under your roof meant you had a 'home' (jiā).
'Home' (家 jiā) + 'inside' (里 lǐ). 'At home' or 'inside the house'.
'Home' (家 jiā) + 'person' (人 rén). 'Family members'.
The 'sun' (日 rì) shining through a 'gate' (门 mén). The 'space' or 'room' (jiān) in between.
A person (人 rén) with a big 'eye' (目 mù) on top. It means 'to see' (jiàn).
'See' (见 jiàn) + 'face' (面 miàn). 'To meet' someone face-to-face.
The 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical. It means 'to be called' or 'to shout' (jiào).
Left side is 'child' + 'filial', right side is 'action'. A teacher 'teaching' (jiāo/jiào) a child.
'Teach' (教 jiào) + 'learn' (学 xué) + 'building' (楼 lóu). An 'academic building'.
To 'introduce' (jiè shào). 'Jie' means 'to sit between', 'shao' has the 'silk' radical.
The 'woman' (女 nǚ) radical on the left. This refers to an 'elder sister' (jiě).
The informal word for 'older sister' (jiě jie).
'Now' (今 jīn) + 'year' (年 nián). 'This year'.
'Now' (今 jīn) + 'day' (天 tiān). 'Today'.
The 'walking' radical (辶 chuò). It means 'to enter' or 'to go in' (jìn).
'Enter' (进 jìn) + 'come' (来 lái). 'To come in'.
'Enter' (进 jìn) + 'go' (去 qù). 'To go in'.
Looks like a person bending over. The number 'nine' (jiǔ).
Left side is 'capital', right is 'especially'. It's a particle meaning 'then', 'exactly', or 'immediately' (jiù).
To 'feel' or 'think' (jué de). 'Jue' means 'to perceive'.
Looks like two hands pushing a bar to 'open' (kāi) a gate.
'Open/Operate' (开 kāi) + 'car' (车 chē). 'To drive a car'.
'Open/Start' (开 kāi) + 'meeting' (会 huì). 'To have a meeting'.
'Open' (开 kāi) + 'play' (玩 wán) + 'laugh' (笑 xiào). 'To crack a joke'.
A 'hand' (手 shǒu) over an 'eye' (目 mù). Imagine shading your eyes to 'look' (kàn) at something.
'Look/Visit' (看 kàn) + 'sickness' (病 bìng). 'To see a doctor'.
'Look' (看 kàn) + 'arrive' (到 dào). 'To see' something successfully.
'Look' (看 kàn) + 'see' (见 jiàn). 'To catch sight of'.
Looks like an 'old man' (老 lǎo) with a cane. It means 'to test' or 'examine' (kǎo).
A 'test' or 'exam' (kǎo shì).
The 'water' (氵 shuǐ) radical. If you need water, you are 'thirsty' (kě).
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical + 'fruit'. The 'fruit' of speech is a 'lesson' or 'class' (kè).
'Class' (课 kè) + 'book' (本 běn). A 'textbook'.
'Class' (课 kè) + 'text' (文 wén). The text in a lesson.
A simple square representing an open 'mouth' (kǒu).
The 'earth' (土 tǔ) radical. It means a 'chunk', 'piece', or 'the basic unit of money' (kuài).
The 'heart' (忄 xīn) radical. A heart beating 'fast' (kuài).
Looks like a wheat plant. Ancient people used it to mean 'to come' (lái).
'Come' (来 lái) + 'arrive' (到 dào). 'To arrive at'.
A person with long hair and a cane. It means 'old' (lǎo).
'Old' (老 lǎo) + 'person' (人 rén). An 'elderly person'.
'Old/Respectable' (老 lǎo) + 'master' (师 shī). A 'teacher'.
A simplified 'child' (子 zǐ) without the horizontal bar. Used as a grammatical particle (le).
The 'field' (田 tián) on top of 'silk' (糸 mì). Working in the field is 'tiring' (lèi).
The 'ice' (冫 bīng) radical on the left. It means 'cold' (lěng).
A 'field' (田 tián) over 'earth' (土 tǔ). A village 'inside' the land. It means 'in' or 'inside' (lǐ).
'Inside' (里 lǐ) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Inside'.
Looks like a 'scale' with two weights. Used for 'two' (liǎng) of something.
The 'rain' (雨 yǔ) radical on top. It means 'zero' (líng).
Looks like a person with arms and legs spread. The number 'six' (liù).
The 'wood' (木 mù) radical. Buildings were made of wood. It means 'floor' or 'building' (lóu).
'Building' (楼 lóu) + 'up' (上 shàng). 'Upstairs'.
'Building' (楼 lóu) + 'down' (下 xià). 'Downstairs'.
The 'foot' (⻊ zú) radical. Feet walk on the 'road' (lù).
'Road' (路 lù) + 'mouth' (口 kǒu). An 'intersection' (the mouth of the road).
'Road' (路 lù) + 'on' (上 shàng). 'On the road'.
The 'woman' (女 nǚ) radical + 'horse' (马 mǎ) for sound. 'Mother' (mā).
The informal word for 'mother' (mā ma).
'Horse' (马 mǎ) + 'road' (路 lù). A 'main road' (where horses used to travel).
'Horse' (马 mǎ) + 'on' (上 shàng). To do something 'immediately' (as fast as being on a horse).
The 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical + 'horse' (马 mǎ). A question particle (ma).
Looks like a 'hook' grabbing a 'shell' (money). It means 'to buy' (mǎi).
The 'heart' (忄 xīn) radical. A 'slow' (màn) heart.
The 'heart' (忄 xīn) radical + 'death/disappear' (亡 wáng). To be so 'busy' (máng) your heart feels lost.
Looks like a piece of 'hair', 'fur', or 'feather' (máo). Also a unit of money.
The 'water' (氵 shuǐ) radical. It means 'not have' or 'disappear in water' (méi).
'Not have' (没 méi) + 'relation' (关系 guān xì). 'It doesn't matter' (No relation/problem).
'Not have' (没 méi) + 'what' (什么 shén me). 'It's nothing' or 'Don't mention it'.
'Not have' (没 méi) + 'matter' (事 shì). 'It's okay' or 'I'm not busy'.
'Not' (没 méi) + 'have' (有 yǒu). 'To not have'.
The 'woman' (女 nǚ) radical + 'not yet'. A woman not yet grown: 'younger sister' (mèi).
The informal word for 'younger sister' (mèi mei).
A simplified drawing of a 'doorway' or 'gate' (mén).
'Door' (门 mén) + 'mouth' (口 kǒu). An 'entrance' or 'doorway'.
'Door' (门 mén) + 'ticket' (票 piào). An 'entrance ticket'.
The 'person' (亻 rén) radical + 'door' (门 mén). Makes pronouns plural (e.g., 'we', 'you all').
'Rice' (米 mǐ) + 'cooked meal' (饭 fàn). 'Cooked rice'.
'Flour' (面 miàn) + 'wrap' (包 bāo). 'Bread'.
'Flour' (面 miàn) + 'strips' (条 tiáo). 'Noodles'.
'Name' (名 míng) + 'character' (字 zì). A 'name'.
'Bright/Clear' (明 míng) + 'white/clear' (白 bái). To 'understand' clearly.
'Bright/Next' (明 míng) + 'year' (年 nián). 'Next year'.
'Bright/Next' (明 míng) + 'day' (天 tiān). 'Tomorrow'.
A 'hand' (手 shǒu) at the bottom. It means 'to take' or 'to hold' (ná).
A 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical. Used to ask 'which' (nǎ).
The question word for 'where' (nǎr).
The question word for 'where' (nǎ lǐ).
'Which' (哪 nǎ) + 'some/plural' (些 xiē). 'Which ones?'
Used to mean 'that' (nà).
'That' (那 nà) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Over there'.
The word for 'there' (nàr).
The word for 'there' (nà lǐ).
'That' (那 nà) + 'some' (些 xiē). 'Those'.
The 'woman' (女 nǚ) radical. Refers to 'milk' or 'grandmother' (nǎi).
The word for paternal 'grandmother' (nǎi nai).
'Field' (田 tián) + 'strength/power' (力 lì). The one who uses strength in the field: 'man' (nán).
'Male' (男 nán) + 'child' (孩儿 hái r). A 'boy'.
'Male' (男 nán) + 'friend' (朋友 péng you). 'Boyfriend'.
'Male' (男 nán) + 'person' (人 rén). 'Man'.
'Male' (男 nán) + 'student/person' (生 shēng). A 'male student' or 'guy'.
Looks like a hanging lantern. It means 'South' (nán).
'South' (南 nán) + 'side' (边 biān). 'The south side'.
Left side relates to a 'short-tailed bird'. It means 'difficult' (nán).
A 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical. A question particle used for 'and you?' (ne).
Originally looked like a strong bear. It means 'can' or 'to be able to' (néng).
The 'person' (亻 rén) radical. It means 'you' (nǐ).
'You' (你 nǐ) + plural (们 men). 'You all'.
Originally a person carrying a harvest of grain. It means 'year' (nián).
'You' (你 nǐ) over a 'heart' (心 xīn). The polite way to say 'you' (nín).
'Cow' (牛 niú) + 'milk' (奶 nǎi). 'Cow's milk'.
Looks like a person kneeling or dancing. It means 'woman' (nǚ).
'Woman' (女 nǚ) + 'child' (儿 ér). 'Daughter'.
'Woman' (女 nǚ) + 'child' (孩儿 hái r). 'Girl'.
'Woman' (女 nǚ) + 'friend' (朋友 péng you). 'Girlfriend'.
'Woman' (女 nǚ) + 'person' (人 rén). 'Woman'.
'Woman' (女 nǚ) + 'student/person' (生 shēng). A 'female student' or 'girl'.
'Beside' (旁 páng) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Next to'.
The 'foot' (⻊ zú) radical. It means 'to run' (pǎo).
'Two moons' (朋 péng) + 'hand/friend' (友 yǒu). Friends are people who go through many months together.
Looks like a 'ticket' or 'slip' (piào).
Looks like a '7' rotated. The number 'seven' (qī).
The 'run' (走 zǒu) radical. It means 'to rise' or 'to start' (qǐ).
'Rise' (起 qǐ) + 'bed' (床 chuáng). 'To get out of bed'.
'Rise' (起 qǐ) + 'come' (来 lái). 'To stand up' or 'wake up'.
'Steam/Gas' (汽 qì) + 'car' (车 chē). A 'motor vehicle' or 'car'.
A 'knife' (刂 dāo) over 'meat/moon'. It means 'front' or 'before' (qián).
'Front' (前 qián) + 'side' (边 biān). 'In front'.
'Before' (前 qián) + 'day' (天 tiān). 'The day before yesterday'.
The 'metal' (钅 jīn) radical. It means 'money' (qián).
'Money' (钱 qián) + 'bag' (包 bāo). A 'wallet'.
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical + 'green/clear' (青 qīng). To 'please' or 'invite' politely.
'Request' (请 qǐng) + 'vacation' (假 jià). 'To ask for leave'.
'Please' (请 qǐng) + 'enter' (进 jìn). 'Please come in'.
'Please' (请 qǐng) + 'ask' (问 wèn). 'May I ask...'
'Please' (请 qǐng) + 'sit' (坐 zuò). 'Please have a seat'.
The 'jade' (王 wáng) radical + 'request'. It means a 'ball' (qiú).
A person walking away from an enclosure. It means 'to go' (qù).
'Past' (去 qù) + 'year' (年 nián). 'Last year'.
The 'fire' (灬) radical at the bottom. It means 'hot' (rè).
A simple sketch of a 'person' (rén) standing on two legs.
Both have the 'speech' (讠 yán) radical. To 'know' or 'recognize' someone (rèn shi).
'Recognize' (认 rèn) + 'true' (真 zhēn). To be 'serious' or 'conscientious'.
A square with a line in the middle. Originally a circle for the 'sun' (rì). Also means 'day'.
'Day' (日 rì) + 'period/time' (期 qī). A 'date'.
Looks like a piece of meat with ribs. It means 'meat' (ròu).
Three horizontal lines. The number 'three' (sān).
A sketch of three 'mountain' peaks (shān).
'Trade' (商 shāng) + 'place' (场 chǎng). A 'shopping mall'.
'Trade' (商 shāng) + 'shop' (店 diàn). A 'shop' or 'store'.
A line above a base. It means 'up' or 'above' (shàng).
'Go' (上 shàng) + 'shift' (班 bàn). 'To go to work'.
'Up' (上 shàng) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Above' or 'on top'.
'Up' (上 shàng) + 'car' (车 chē). 'To get in a car/bus'.
'Up/Past' (上 shàng) + 'time' (次 cì). 'Last time'.
'Go to' (上 shàng) + 'class' (课 kè). 'To attend class'.
'Go on' (上 shàng) + 'net' (网 wǎng). 'To surf the internet'.
'Before' (上 shàng) + 'noon' (午 wǔ). 'Morning'.
'Go to' (上 shàng) + 'study' (学 xué). 'To go to school'.
A 'small' (小 xiǎo) with an extra stroke. It means 'few' or 'little' (shǎo).
'Body' (身 shēn) + 'on' (上 shàng). 'On the body'.
'Body' (身 shēn) + 'body/form' (体 tǐ). 'Body' or 'health'.
The word for 'what' (shén me).
'Become/Grow' (生 shēng) + 'sick' (病 bìng). 'To fall ill'.
'Become' (生 shēng) + 'air/breath' (气 qì). To be 'angry' (blowing out air).
'Birth' (生 shēng) + 'day' (日 rì). 'Birthday'.
A cross shape. The number 'ten' (shí).
The word for 'time' or 'moment' (shí hou).
'Time' (时 shí) + 'interval' (间 jiān). 'Time' or 'duration'.
Looks like a person holding a tool. It means 'matter', 'thing', or 'business' (shì).
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical + 'rule'. To 'try' or 'test' (shì).
The 'sun' (日 rì) on top of 'correct'. It means 'is', 'am', 'are' (shì).
'Is or is not' (shì bu shì). A common way to ask 'Is it?'
A sketch of a 'hand' (shǒu) with fingers.
'Hand' (手 shǒu) + 'machine' (机 jī). A 'cell phone'.
Looks like a stack of papers or a 'book' (shū).
'Book' (书 shū) + 'bag' (包 bāo). A 'schoolbag'.
'Book' (书 shū) + 'shop' (店 diàn). A 'bookstore'.
The 'wood' (木 mù) radical on the left. It means 'tree' (shù).
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical. The question word for 'who' (shéi).
Looks like flowing 'water' (shuǐ).
'Water' (水 shuǐ) + 'fruit' (果 guǒ). 'Fruit'.
The 'eye' (目 mù) radical. When your eye droops, you 'sleep' (shuì).
The full verb for 'to sleep' (shuì jiào).
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical. It means 'to speak' or 'to say' (shuō).
'Speak' (说 shuō) + 'speech' (话 huà). 'To talk'.
A square with two marks inside. The number 'four' (sì).
The 'walking' radical (辶 chuò). It means 'to give as a gift' or 'to deliver' (sòng).
The word for 'years of age' (suì).
The 'person' (亻 rén) radical. It means 'he' or 'him' (tā).
'He' (他 tā) + plural (们 men). 'They' (male or mixed group).
The 'woman' (女 nǚ) radical. It means 'she' or 'her' (tā).
'She' (她 tā) + plural (们 men). 'They' (female group).
A 'big' (大 dà) with an extra dot. It means 'too' or 'extremely' (tài).
A 'big' (大 dà) with a line above it. It means 'sky' or 'day' (tiān).
'Sky' (天 tiān) + 'air/breath' (气 qì). 'Weather'.
The 'mouth' (口 kǒu) radical. It means 'to listen' (tīng).
'Listen' (听 tīng) + 'arrive' (到 dào). 'To hear' something successfully.
'Listen' (听 tīng) + 'see' (见 jiàn). 'To hear'.
'Listen' (听 tīng) + 'write' (写 xiě). 'Dictation'.
'Same' (同 tóng) + 'study' (学 xué). 'Classmate'.
'Picture' (图 tú) + 'book' (书 shū) + 'building' (馆 guǎn). A 'library'.
'Evening' (夕 xī) + 'divination'. It means 'outside' (wài).
'Outside' (外 wài) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Outside'.
'Outside' (外 wài) + 'country' (国 guó). 'Foreign country'.
'Outside' (外 wài) + 'language' (语 yǔ). 'Foreign language'.
'Jade' (王 wáng) radical + 'child' (儿 ér). To 'play' (wán r).
The 'sun' (日 rì) radical + 'to escape'. It means 'late' or 'evening' (wǎn).
'Evening' (晚 wǎn) + 'meal' (饭 fàn). 'Dinner'.
'Evening' (晚 wǎn) + 'on' (上 shàng). 'Night' or 'evening'.
'Net' (网 wǎng) + 'on' (上 shàng). 'Online'.
'Net' (网 wǎng) + 'friend' (友 yǒu). 'Internet friend'.
'Death' (亡 wáng) on top of 'heart' (心 xīn). To 'forget' (wàng) is to have your heart lose something.
The full verb for 'to forget' (wàng jì).
A 'mouth' (口 kǒu) inside a 'gate' (门 mén). To 'ask' (wèn) someone at the gate.
Looks like an ancient weapon. It means 'I' or 'me' (wǒ).
'I' (我 wǒ) + plural (们 men). 'We' or 'us'.
The number 'five' (wǔ).
'Noon' (午 wǔ) + 'meal' (饭 fàn). 'Lunch'.
The 'water' (氵 shuǐ) radical. It means 'to wash' (xǐ).
'Wash' (洗 xǐ) + 'hand' (手 shǒu) + 'room' (间 jiān). 'Bathroom' or 'toilet'.
To 'like' (xǐ huan). 'Xi' means happiness.
Looks like a bird in its nest as the sun sets. It means 'West' (xī).
'West' (西 xī) + 'side' (边 biān). 'The west side'.
A line below a base. It means 'down' or 'below' (xià).
'Finish' (下 xià) + 'shift' (班 bàn). 'To get off work'.
'Down' (下 xià) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Below'.
'Down' (下 xià) + 'car' (车 chē). 'To get off a bus/car'.
'Down/Next' (下 xià) + 'time' (次 cì). 'Next time'.
'Finish' (下 xià) + 'class' (课 kè). 'Class dismissed'.
'After' (下 xià) + 'noon' (午 wǔ). 'Afternoon'.
'Down/Fall' (下 xià) + 'rain' (雨 yǔ). 'To rain'.
A 'person' (人 rén) moving forward. It means 'first' or 'before' (xiān).
'First' (先 xiān) + 'born' (生 shēng). 'Mr.' or 'husband'.
'Now' (xiàn zài).
'Tree' + 'eye' over a 'heart' (心 xīn). To 'think' or 'want' (xiǎng).
Three small strokes. It means 'small' (xiǎo).
'Small' (小 xiǎo) + 'child' (孩儿 hái r). 'Child'.
'Small' (小 xiǎo) + 'sister' (姐 jiě). 'Miss' or 'young lady'.
'Small' (小 xiǎo) + 'friend' (朋友 péng you). 'Child' (friendly term).
'Small' (小 xiǎo) + 'time' (时 shí). An 'hour'.
'Small' (小 xiǎo) + 'study' (学 xué). 'Elementary school'.
'Elementary school' + 'student' (生 shēng). 'Elementary student'.
The 'bamboo' (⺮ zhú) radical on top. It means 'to laugh' or 'smile' (xiào).
A 'roof' (冖) radical. It means 'to write' (xiě).
The 'speech' (讠 yán) radical doubled. 'Thank you' (xiè xie).
Left side means 'standing', right side is an 'axe' (斤 jīn). Imagine cutting new wood: 'new' (xīn).
'New' (新 xīn) + 'year' (年 nián). 'New Year'.
'Star' (星 xīng) + 'period' (期 qī). 'Week'.
'Week' (星期) + 'day' (日 rì). 'Sunday'.
'Week' (星期) + 'sky/day' (天 tiān). 'Sunday'.
Looks like an intersection. It means 'okay' or 'to walk' (xíng).
A 'person' (亻 rén) leaning against a 'tree' (木 mù). It means 'to rest' (xiū xi).
A 'child' (子 zǐ) under a 'roof' (宀 mián). It means 'to learn' or 'study' (xué).
'Study' (学 xué) + 'person/born' (生 shēng). 'Student'.
To 'study' or 'learn' (xué xí).
'Study' (学 xué) + 'building' (校 xiào). 'School'.
'Study' (学 xué) + 'courtyard' (院 yuàn). 'College' or 'institute'.
A 'woman' (女 nǚ) radical. It means 'to want' or 'will' (yào).
A common particle meaning 'also' (yě).
Looks like a person's head or a 'page' (yè).
The word for paternal 'grandfather' (yé ye).
A single horizontal line. The number 'one' (yī).
'One' (一 yī) + 'half' (半 bàn). 'One half'.
'One' (一 yī) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Simultaneously' or 'on one side'.
'A little bit' (yì diǎn r).
'A little while' (yí huì r).
'One piece' (yí kuài r). Often means 'together'.
'One' (一 yī) + 'start' (起 qǐ). 'Together'.
'A brief moment' (yí xià r).
'One' (一 yī) + 'some' (些 xiē). 'Some' or 'a few'.
'One' (一 yī) + 'appearance' (样 yàng). 'The same'.
The word for 'clothes' (yī fu).
'Medicine' (医 yī) + 'person' (生 shēng). 'Doctor'.
'Medicine' (医 yī) + 'courtyard/place' (院 yuàn). 'Hospital'.
Looks like a bucket or tool. It means 'to use' (yòng).
A 'hand' (𠂇) holding 'meat' (月). It means 'to have' (yǒu).
'Have' (有 yǒu) + possessive. Means 'some' (e.g., some people).
'Have' (有 yǒu) + 'name' (名 míng). 'Famous' (has a name).
'Have' (有 yǒu) + 'time' (时 shí). 'Sometimes'.
The full phrase for 'sometimes' (yǒu shí hou).
'Have' (有 yǒu) + 'some' (些 xiē). 'Some'.
'Have some' (yǒu yì xiē).
'Have' (有 yǒu) + 'use' (用 yòng). 'Useful'.
A 'hand' (𠂇) near a 'mouth' (口 kǒu). Most people use their 'right' (yòu) hand to eat.
'Right' (右 yòu) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Right side'.
Looks like 'rain' (yǔ) drops falling through a window.
The basic unit of 'currency' (yuán).
The 'walking' radical (辶 chuò). It means 'far' (yuǎn).
A sketch of a 'crescent moon' (yuè). Also means 'month'.
Looks like a 'gate'. It means 'again' (zài).
'Again' (再 zài) + 'see' (见 jiàn). 'Goodbye' (See you again).
The 'earth' (土 tǔ) radical. It means 'at' or 'located in' (zài).
'At' (在 zài) + 'home' (家 jiā). 'At home'.
The 'sun' (日 rì) above a 'cross/shield'. It means 'early' or 'morning' (zǎo).
'Morning' (早 zǎo) + 'meal' (饭 fàn). 'Breakfast'.
'Morning' (早 zǎo) + 'on' (上 shàng). 'Early morning'.
The question word for 'how' (zěn me).
The 'standing' (立 lì) radical on the left. It means 'to stand' or 'station' (zhàn).
The 'hand' (扌 shǒu) radical + 'weapon'. It means 'to look for' (zhǎo).
'Look for' (找 zhǎo) + 'arrive' (到 dào). 'To find' successfully.
The 'walking' radical (辶 chuò). It means 'this' (zhè).
'This' (这 zhè) + 'side' (边 biān). 'This side' or 'over here'.
The word for 'here' (zhèr).
The word for 'here' (zhè lǐ).
'This' (这 zhè) + plural (些 xiē). 'These'.
A grammatical particle used to indicate a continuous state (zhe).
Looks like a vessel on a stand. It means 'real' or 'true' (zhēn).
'True' (真 zhēn) + possessive. 'Really' or 'true'.
A line above a 'foot' (止 zhǐ). It means 'straight' or 'correct' (zhèng).
Indicates an action is 'in progress' (zhèng zài).
'Knowledge/Arrow' (知 zhī) + 'path' (道 dào). To 'know' (zhī dào).
'Know' (知 zhī) + 'recognize' (识 shí). 'Knowledge'.
A line through the middle of a square. It means 'middle' or 'center' (zhōng).
'Middle' (中 zhōng) + 'country' (国 guó). 'China'.
'Middle' (中 zhōng) + 'space/interval' (间 jiān). 'In the middle'.
'Middle/Chinese' (中 zhōng) + 'text' (文 wén). The 'Chinese language'.
'Middle' (中 zhōng) + 'noon' (午 wǔ). 'Noon' or 'midday'.
'Middle' (中 zhōng) + 'school' (学 xué). 'Middle school'.
'Middle school' + 'student' (生 shēng). 'Middle school student'.
Looks like a person carrying a 'thousand' over 'earth'. It means 'heavy' (zhòng).
'Heavy/Weighty' (重 zhòng) + 'want/need' (要 yào). 'Important'.
The 'person' (亻 rén) radical + 'master/candle'. To 'live' or 'stay' (zhù).
To 'prepare' (zhǔn bèi).
The 'wood' (木 mù) radical at the bottom. It means 'table' (zhuō zi).
A 'child' (子 zǐ) under a 'roof' (宀 mián). Characters were like children growing under a roof. It means 'character' (zì).
A sketch of a 'child' (zǐ) with arms out. Common noun suffix.
A person on top of a foot. It means 'to walk' (zǒu).
'Walk' (走 zǒu) + 'road' (路 lù). 'To walk'.
The 'sun' (日 rì) on top. It means 'most' or 'superlative' (zuì).
'Most' (最 zuì) + 'good' (好 hǎo). 'Best'.
'Most' (最 zuì) + 'after' (后 hòu). 'Last' or 'final'.
The 'sun' (日 rì) radical. It means 'yesterday' (zuó tiān).
A 'hand' (𠂇) over a 'tool' (工 gōng). It means 'left' (zuǒ).
'Left' (左 zuǒ) + 'side' (边 biān). 'Left side'.
Two 'people' (人 rén) sitting on the 'ground' (土 tǔ). It means 'to sit' (zuò).
'Sit' (坐 zuò) + 'down' (下 xià). 'Sit down'.
The 'person' (亻 rén) radical + 'ancient' + 'tap'. It means 'to do' or 'to make' (zuò).
